name: sbrbis
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

stmt.origin: bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wb(wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

-| wb(wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

body.origin: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:

-| wb(wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

stmt.origin: bibi1i(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1), w2)

body.origin:
|- wb(wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2)

comment: Introduce right biconditional inside of a substitution. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.)
